definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Other workers will engineer a result after months of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人員將在進化數月之後監造一個結果。

sentences.english: If your energy level is low for months, get checked out by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你連續數月身體抱恙，那就去看醫生吧。

sentences.english: He only traded for a few months and went out of business because he was undercapitalized.
sentences.chinese: 他僅經商數月，便由於投資不足而歇業。

sentences.english: The brave young man voyaged single-handed in his yacht for months.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的年輕人獨自乘遊艇航行數月。

sentences.english: Protective immunity against RSV infection after infection only last several months, so that reinfection often occurred.
sentences.chinese: 感染後保護性免疫僅能持續數月，再感染經常發生。

sentences.english: In recent months, more than two dozen sub-prime lenders have closed their doors.
sentences.chinese: 近來數月，二十四家以上的低收入貸款公司關門大吉。

sentences.english: After the feast, the bones were stored for months in treasure houses.
sentences.chinese: 盛宴結束以後，這些骨頭就會被存放在寶庫數月。

sentences.english: I started to pick up my career months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我是在數月年重拾了自己的事業。

sentences.english: Some crown galls strains changed properties many months after induction.
sentences.chinese: 在誘發後數月內有些冠癭株發生明顯變化。

sentences.english: After a few months, cotton prices by cow go bears, entering the downlink channel.
sentences.chinese: 數月後，棉價由牛轉熊，進入下行通道。

sentences.english: New instructions and warnings are expected on product labels within the next several months.
sentences.chinese: 在未來數月產品標籤上會有新的用法說明和警告。

sentences.english: For example, that work task you've been putting off for weeks or months?
sentences.chinese: 例如，某些工作任務經被拖上幾周甚至數月。

sentences.english: The drift wood could have been drifting in the ocean currents for months or even years.
sentences.chinese: 這塊漂木可能已在洋流中漂流了數月或者幾年。

sentences.english: Dracunculiasis is rarely fatal but infected people become non-functional for months.
sentences.chinese: 麥地那龍線蟲病極少致命，但是感染者數月不能工作。

sentences.english: Pumpkins mature in early autumn and can be stored for a few months in a dry, warm place.
sentences.chinese: 果實於早秋成熟，置於溫暖乾燥處可保存數月。

sentences.english: In recent months, Prato has become a diplomatic point of contention.
sentences.chinese: 最近數月，普拉託也成了外交上的焦點。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
